The package moanin was developped to provide a simple and efficient workflow
for time-course gene expression data. To use this package, install it with

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install devtools
install.packages("devtools")
# use devtools to install the package
devtools::install_github("NelleV/stats-tool", branch="r_package")
```
